description: To address the Local Privilege Escalation and SAML Token Signature Bypass vulnerabilities on nix machines running in VMware, it is essential to implement the updates specified in VMware's advisory documents. Specifically, the advisories VMSA-2023-0024 and VMSA-2023-0019 outline necessary patches that should be applied to mitigate these risks. These patches enhance the security posture by fixing the privilege escalation and ensuring robust handling of SAML tokens. Administrators should ensure that all affected systems are updated promptly to minimize any potential exploitations. Regularly checking VMware's security notifications will help maintain up-to-date defenses against emerging threats.
